sections.heading: Continuing jurisdiction6-839.Continuing jurisdictionIf the license of an escrow agent is surrendered, suspended or revoked, the agent nevertheless continues to be subject to the provisions of this chapter and to the duties previously undertaken for so long as it acts as a fiduciary with respect to a
sections.text: Continuing jurisdiction6-839.Continuing jurisdictionIf the license of an escrow agent is surrendered, suspended or revoked, the agent nevertheless continues to be subject to the provisions of this chapter and to the duties previously undertaken for so long as it acts as a fiduciary with respect to any escrow business previously undertaken.
